subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|弓|寸|t1=bow|t2=hand, wrist|ls=ic}}. 弓 was assimilated to 身 in the clerical script period.

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[shoot]], to [[launch]], to [[eject]]
# to [[guess]]
# to [[allude]] to
# to [[emit]]
# {{lb|zh|colloquial}} to [[ejaculate]]
# {{†}} [[archery]]
